cells.data:
-- then (>>) :: Monad m => m a -> m b -> m b
on |then|(ma, mb)
    set c to class of ma
    if c is list then
        thenList(ma, mb)
    else if c is record then
        if keys(ma) contains "Maybe" then
            thenMay(ma, mb)
        else
            thenIO(ma, mb)
        end if
    else
        thenIO(ma, mb)
    end if
end |then|
